channel.title: Copy of Digg top 24 hours
channel.description: RSS feed with direct links to popular technology articles. based on superdigg pipe

item.title: [+1868] Fact: It’s Time to End the Two Party System in the US
item.description: More politicians -- and more voters -- are feeling out of place in either the Democratic or Republican Party. Is it time we added a new party?

item.title: [+1604] 19 Tips Every Windows 7 User Needs to Know
item.description: Your OS drives your whole PC experience, so it's your job as an enthusiast to keep it in a high state of tune

item.title: [+1549] We'll Know It Was You, Will Smith (PIC)
[+1534] Michael C. Hall 'Fully Recovered' From Cancer
item.description: The wife of Michael C. Hall says the "Dexter" star is fully recovered from cancer and has returned to work.

item.title: [+1284] He's Going To Regret This In The Morning [PIC]
item.description: Playing fetch with the wrong kind of ball.

item.title: [+1247] From Lost to Loved: A Cat's Life in Photos
[+992] Security Stepped Up at Comedy Central
item.description: The New York Police Department has stepped up security at the headquarters of the Comedy Central cable channel after an Islamic extremist website posted apparent threats to the creators of South Park, Matt Stone and Trey Parker, for making fun of the Prophet Mohammed.

item.title: [+910] Stunning new images of the sun (photos)
item.description: NASA released stunning new images of the sun that have been sent back by its Solar Dynamics Observatory (SDO), which was launched into space on February 11.

item.title: [+817] How Not To Handle A Resignation Gracefully
item.description: There are two sides to every story, but this email exchange between Mahalo founder and CEO Jason Calacanis and one of his (now former) employees is a lesson in how not to handle a resignation.

item.title: [+797] Fox News: Jon Stewart’s Punching Bag
item.description: George W. Bush and Dick Cheney are long gone. Fox News Channel is Jon Stewart’s new enemy No. 1.

item.title: [+732] Apple to Get Criminal Case Against iPhone Thief
item.description: The process that recovered the next-generation iPhone prototype has triggered a police investigation, an official said on Friday. Apple has reportedly talked to the Santa Clara County district attorney for a preliminary look into whether or not recovering and selling the iPhone to Gizmodo amounted to theft.

item.title: [+712] Apparently AT-AT makes a great pet
item.description: If you are allergic to dogs or cats, you should maybe consider getting an AT-AT

item.title: [+677] HBO's 'Eastbound & Down' Season 2 is Happening!
item.description: Season 2 of HBO’s Eastbound & Down is coming together. The setting for the underrated comedy starring Danny McBride will move from North Carolina to Mexico, with Michael Pena and Ana de la Reguera joining as new regulars.

item.title: [+644] The Ugly Truth Behind Factory Farms
item.description: Untreated animal waste, polluted waterways and lack of government oversight are just some of the problems with large-scale industrial farming.

item.title: [+590] DMV recalls plate with coded racist message
item.description: A photo of the truck hit the Web a few days ago, went viral on car and other blogs and finally came to the attention of the Council on American-Islamic Relations, an advocacy group for American Muslims. On Wednesday morning, the group complained to the DMV that the plate contained a white supremacist and neo-Nazi statement, & the DMV agreed.

item.title: [+571] Deadly New Fungus Emerging in Oregon Expected to Spread
item.description: A deadly, airborne new strain of fungus has emerged in Oregon. It has killed nearly one out of four known affected people so far and might also attack animals ranging from dogs to dolphins. And it is likely to spread. "This novel fungus is worrisome because it appears to be a threat to otherwise healthy people."

item.title: [+549] Survey Finds US Doesn't Give a Shit About Climate Change
item.description: A new survey conducted by HSBC finds that in cities around the world, climate change is cited as the number one issue facing the world. Bucking the trend were American respondents, who ranked terrorism and the recession higher.

item.title: [+539] Review: The New 15-in. MacBook Pro: An Elegant Combination
item.description: Sporting faster processors -- including Core i5s and i7s -- more-powerful graphics chips from Nvidia and better battery life, Apple's latest MacBook Pro laptops deliver a well-balanced combination of power and efficiency.

item.title: [+530] Futuristic $5K short may be next 'District 9'
item.description: Remember when Panic Attack blew up online recently? How the short and the director from Uruguay took the town by storm and Sam Raimi became attached to produce? It's happening all over again. Most studios have already inquired with about expanding 'The Raven' into a feature, and this $5000 short is only 72 hours old!

item.title: [+515] 10 Amazing Inventions That You Didn’t Know Existed
item.description: Technology has brought virtual worlds into our computers for many years. Now, virtual reality (VR) will be in our living rooms. The underground effort that has been an experimental fantasy for decades has become reality now
